    • Constructor Detail

      • TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder

        public TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder(File tasmFile,
                                      NucleotideFastaDataStore fullLengthSequenceDataStore)
                               throws IOException
        Create a new instance of TigrContigFileDataStoreBuilder which will build a TigrContigDataStore for the given tasm file.
        Parameters:
        tasmFile - the tasm file make a TigrContigDataStore with.
        fullLengthSequenceDataStore - a datastore containing the full length sequences of all the input reads that are assembled into the contig file. This datastore is used to extract the full ungapped length for each read to correctly populate the AssembledRead.getReadInfo() instance since not all of that information is stored directly in the contig file. Each read id in the contigs must have a corresponding record in this sequence datastore. This sequence datastore may contain additional records that did not make it into the contig file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the tasm file does not exist, or can not be read.
        NullPointerException - if either tasmFile or fullLengthSequenceDataStore are null.

      • TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder

        public TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder(File tasmFile,
                                      NucleotideSequenceDataStore fullLengthSequenceDataStore)
                               throws IOException
        Create a new instance of TigrContigFileDataStoreBuilder which will build a TigrContigDataStore for the given contig file.
        Parameters:
        tasmFile - the tasm file make a TigrContigDataStore with.
        fullLengthSequenceDataStore - a datastore containing the full length sequences of all the input reads that are assembled into the contig file. This datastore is used to extract the full ungapped length for each read to correctly populate the AssembledRead.getReadInfo() instance since not all of that information is stored directly in the contig file. Each read id in the contigs must have a corresponding record in this sequence datastore. This sequence datastore may contain additional records that did not make it into the contig file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the tasm file does not exist, or can not be read.
        NullPointerException - if either tasmFile or fullLengthSequenceDataStore are null.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder filter(DataStoreFilter filter)
        Only include the TasmContigs which pass the given DataStoreFilter. If a filter is not given to this builder, then all records in the tasm file will be included in the built TasmContigDataStore.
        Parameters:
        filter - a DataStoreFilter instance that can be used to filter out specified TasmContigs; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if filter is null.

      • hint

        public TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder hint(DataStoreProviderHint hint)
        Provide a DataStoreProviderHint to this builder to let it know the implementation preferences of the client. If no hint is given, then this builder will try to store all the TasmContig records in memory which may cause an Exception if there isn't enough memory. The DataStoreProviderHint is just a guideline and may be ignored by this builder when determining which TasmContigDataStore implementation to chose to build in build().
        Parameters:
        hint - an instance of DataStoreProviderHint; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if hint is null.
        See Also:
        DataStoreProviderHint

      • build

        public TasmContigDataStore build()
                          throws IOException
        Parse the given tasm file and return a new instance of a TasmContigDataStore using all the input parameters given so far. If not all optional parameters are set then default values will be used:
        • If no DataStoreFilter has been specified by filter(DataStoreFilter), then all TasmContigs will be included in this TasmContigDataStore.
        • If no DataStoreProviderHint has been specified by hint(DataStoreProviderHint), then this builder will try to store all the TasmContigs that meet the DataStoreFilter requirements in memory. This may cause out of memory errors if there is not enough memory available.
        Returns:
        a new TasmContigDataStore instance; never null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the tasm file.
        See Also:
        hint(DataStoreProviderHint)
